mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bb_question WHERE 1=1
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%')
AND classifyCode like CONCAT(#{classifyCode},'%')
ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT id, userId, title, detail, status,tag,ip, createTime, lastUpdate, points, isSolve, classifyCode, browseNum, recommendEndTime, (select count(id) from bb_question_answer where questionId = q.id and parentId != '') answerNum FROM bb_question q WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY answerNum DESC
